text: The English Patient is a 1996 British-American romantic drama movie based on the novel of the same name by Michael Ondaatje. It was written and directed by Anthony Minghella. It stars Joseph Fiennes, Kristin Scott Thomas, Juliette Binoche and Willem Dafoe. This melodrama won many Academy Awards, including Best Picture of the Year. == Other websites == * Category:1996 romantic drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American war movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:British war movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies directed by Anthony Minghella Category:German-language movies Category:Italian-language movies Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Miramax movies
title: The English Patient (movie)
